neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: Media Processing tutorials
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: Media processing tutorials explain usage of Neurotechnology Media Processing library API.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]AdjustGrayscaleImage[/b] - demonstrates how to adjust brightness and contrast of grayscale image.[br] [b]AdjustRgbImage[/b] - demonstrates how to adjust brightness and contrast of rgb image.[br] [b]AlphaBlendRgbImage[/b] - demonstrates rgb image alpha blending.[br] [b]InvertGrayscaleImage[/b] - demonstrates grayscale image invertion.[br] [b]InvertRgbImage[/b] - demonstrates rgb image invertion.[br] [b]ScaleGrayscaleImage[/b] - demonstrates grayscale image scaling.[br]
